title: MLP-based isolated phoneme classification using likelihood features extracted from reconstructed phase space

excerpt: Abstract Nonlinear properties of a complex signal can be represented in reconstructed phase space (RPS). Previously, researchers have developed RPS-based feature extraction approaches to capture nonlinear properties. Typically, these approaches are more  ...
